content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the side porch of my house in the country 4 miles from buttonwillow, a small town of 2000 people.  it was approximately 6 p.M. in the evening.  i saw something out of the corner of my eye, looked up and saw what at first i thought was a very large jet.  then i noticed there were no wings and no tail.  it was very shiny silver and was approximately 3 football fields in length it seemed anyway.It was  very straight, no curves.  it was quite far away but i could see it clearly.  it was a long cylinder with  3 things on the top of it that looked like fish gills sticking up. in comparison to the cylinder, they were very small, one in the front, one in the middle and one at the end, but they were on top of it, not to the sides and not underneath. it was traveling slowly from the south to the north and then dissappeared. it was moving in a steady motion, not wiggily like the saucer ufos many times do. i wasn't surprised to see it because i have seen ufos quite a few times. i just wish i had gotten my camera and taken a video or snapshot. it was really beautiful. it was so shiny and silvery.  i was not afraid. actually once about 40 years ago i saw a similiar object in shafter, california. but it was red, like blood.  it also passed overhead at a slow steady pace.
content.summary: Long shiny silver cylinder; about 3 football fields in length; had a trail;

content.detailedDescription: I was in my hot tub only 10 sec. looking up at the clear star lit night when a triangular object flew over my head. it appeared very low, less than 1000 ft. it was very large, dark arrowhead shape with a concave back traveling very fast. i could see the entire shape as it was lit with little white lights around the perimeter of the craft. the lights weren't shining but twinkling. it was thin and curved like an arrowhead. it seemed very stealthy and emitted no sound. it was about the size of a stealth fighter. the size of it with no noise totally scared me. the only way i saw it was because i was looking in the right place at the right time or you would have never seen it. it was traveling east to west in a straight line. approx. dupage airport toward dekalb. just north of rt. 38. i called the local police dept., but no one had reported anything. i did notice the dogs in the area barking after it went by. my heart was going 100 mph, it was very scarry, yet i wanted to see it again. i'm posting this hoping someone else saw what i saw. it was only 4 seconds as it flew over the trees and houses, but i know what i saw.
content.summary: Arrowhead shape ufo with little white lights around perimeter flew over my head

content.detailedDescription: I was at r way then somthin flew over my car and then my car shut down it lasted about three min
content.summary: Cool

content.detailedDescription: About a month ago i witnessed three lights heading south bound that looked like flares. then one of them moved away from the others and disappeared. then subsequnetly reappeared. then all three headed away from me very rapidly and disappeared. i told my wife about it. she reacted very nonchalantly about it. then, last night i was walking out of my garage and my niece who was visting my sister in law across the street, ran up to me and said "look uncle we see some ufos." i looked out across the sky and saws two lights next to each other. i called my wife to look and i told here that, that's what i had seen last month. we all watched as they both went up and disappeared. besides my niece, there were three nephews and my sister in law who witnessed this event. we have not discussed it either! as we all stood outside, the lights reappeared one above the other this time. they began to decend. the top one would disappear then reappear below the other then the other one would disappear and reappear below the other. this occurred several times untill they both reached the bottom and disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw two lights in the distance that were stationary, looked like automobiles. then both started to move upwards and quickly disappeared. then they both reappeared and moved downward disappearing and taking turns reappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
Bright shining object, approximately the size, maybe slightly smaller, of my thumb nail at arms length.  object/light hovered in one spot for about 2 minutes, then disappeared when camera auto-focus beam went off.




this sighting just happened last night.  i was at the computer...My wife was doing the dishes...We both kept hearing an unusually loud, low pitched, rumbling sound, going overhead...We could not tell, from inside if the sounds were jet engines, or the wind.  i had gotten up and looked outside on three earlier occasions to see what it was, or if i could see something flying overhead.  there was, in fact, a constant howling wind all evening.  but, there also was a steady stream of jets, aircraft, or something overhead.  i couldn't see them because of the cloud cover, but i could hear them, that is, apart from the wind.  and, i could hear the doppler pitch change in the engine sound as they passed by.

except for the chemtrail planes (i have 100���s of photos) there are no regular flight paths over my place at this time of day, and very few at any time of day. there also are no major airports nearby.  we have two community airports, potsdam & massena, each about 12 miles from my location; one due west, one due north.  fort drum is approx 80 miles southwest of my location.  there were no stars or moon visible, there was a low cloud cover, and it was quite windy...I could not tell from inside if the sound i was hearing was the wind or a jet engine...Which is why i kept going outside and checking.

just before i went outside for a fourth time (and this is where it gets a little weird), i said to my wife: "i keep getting a sensation like i am being watched, or stared at;" like when someone is standing behind you and is staring at you, and you can almost "feel" it.  the thing is, she was off to my left, in my field of vision, doing the dishes; and we live alone?

i went outside and this time there was a single very bright white light, shining like a star over my neighbors barn, who happens to be a detective with the nys troopers, and who was outside with his family observing and commenting in an excited way about the light/object...It wasn't reflecting like the moon...It was shining, sparkling, or emitting light, and so bright, i could only see light, i could not see an object, just a source of light.  i was looking slightly north of west, up at an angle of approx 35��� from the earth...The object was slightly smaller than my thumbnail extended at arms length...There were no other lights in the sky...I live in the country, there are no streets lights or other forms of light pollution.  the object must have been quite low in the sky, because there was a low, visible cloud covering/ceiling last night.

i asked my wife to get my camera, a canon power shot s2-is (it gets a little weirder here).  as i pulled the camera up to my eye, i was thinking i was going to have trouble finding the object in the viewfinder, shooting in total darkness and all.  i was surprised to see the object, right there in the view finder, no problem at all finding it...I zoomed in some on the object and was i thinking; ���i'll take this picture, and then i'll take another with the flash up/on and see if the object responds to it.���  i had the auto-focus on, and when i squeezed the shutter to focus, of course it shot out that green laser beam.  then, just as, perhaps slightly before, the shutter went off (i have the camera set to make a sound like an old 35mm) and there was a slight delay in the shot because the camera had set the exposure to 1/8 of a second���. right at that instant, just after i zoomed in, and just before the camera locked on and froze the image, a split second before the shutter went off, i saw in the view-finder the object change from a bright shining white light, to a blue sphere with white light shining through the blue with a blotchy sort look...It kind of looked like one of those pictures of the surface of sun, except it was blue...That's when the shutter went off...And that is what the picture shows. i can���t say if the object actually changed in appearance, or if it was the ���zooming��� that caused me to see it differently?  my wife didn���t see what i saw, the change in the objects appearance from bright a bright white light, to blue sphere���she had just turned to shut the front door, it was chilly out, and when she turned back, she asked; ���where did it go?��� 

i could not see the object in the viewfinder anymore...It seemed to just disappear���.I didn���t even think i got anything on the exposure.  i pulled the camera away from my eye to see if i could re-find the object without the camera.  there was a glowing in the cloud cover where the object had been.  i could hear my neighbor and his family saying to each other; ���did you see that?������everyone sounded quite excited, so were my wife and i.  it looked as if the object was now above the clouds and illuminating them from above.  although, i could not see anything of the object anymore, or make out any shape...Just the clouds slightly illuminated from above where the object/light had been.  the illumination was growing fainter quite fast...So, i pulled the camera back up and tried to get a second picture...It doesn't show much...Just looks like there���s some slightly illuminated fog.

i haven���t talked to my neighbor yet.  i hope to see him tonight, or perhaps this weekend.  also, after i took the pictures���i remembered that i hadn���t yet changed my clock on the camera, which is why the time stamp is an hour off from my reported times.

greg

ps:

when i first dowmloaded the pics from my camera, i could not see the object in the piture onmy monitor, just black. however, i could see it in the view-screen on the camera.  i discovered my monitor settings(brightness & contrast) were off a little.  after i adjusted the settings, i could see on the monitor what i can see on the camera.

ps-2:

i have cropped, enlarged, and auto-enhanced a photo.  i can't see where to upload/attach the photo on this extened form.  i will try to send a follow up.  i hope it all ends up at the same place?

greg
content.summary: Bright shining object, size: slightly smaller than my thumb nail at arms length, hovered for about 2 minutes, disappeared when camera autofoucus beam went off

content.detailedDescription: I woke up and had to use the bathroom. i had a bunk bed with my older brother. i slept on the top bunk so i had to climb down to use the bathroom. the bathroom was halfway down the hall between the bedrooms and the living room. the living room was dark, but the bathroom light was on so i had no problem getting up to go. i went back into my room to go back to sleep. as i was climbing up to get back into bed, i saw a glowing orb outside my window move diagonally up and to the right slowly. it disappeared from view. i was in shock and scared, but i still ran to the window to see it. in the short time that it had moved out of my view and me running to the window it had disappered. it was by far the most frightening part of my life. i told my friends and i told my sister, but to this day i have not told my parents do to the fear of them not believing me. one scarier part of this is the fact that you would think this was a once in a lifetime event. something you would see by chance just once. it happened again two nights later. same events. i woke up to use the bathroom, but this time i checked my parents clock as i walked by their bedroom. the time was 3:35 am. i saw the orb and when i ran to the window it wasn't there. the second time i saw it i turned the lights and the television on and slept on the floor at the foot of his bed. i never told my brother or my parents about the experience. so far i don't think anyone believes me, but it doesn't matter because i know what i saw. it was to close to be a plane. it made no sound at all. it happened twice. it didn't move fast from what i had seen and it disappeared instantly. i was twelve when this happened. the only reason i am reporting this is because the newspaper had an article about this site. i also think about it a lot and i've just had a more recent sighting. i have no evidence for it not something i could've planned.
content.summary: Woke up to use bathroom. climbing up my bunk-bed and out the window i saw a glowing sphere floating diaganoly up between the woods and building.

content.detailedDescription: It was a bright clear spring morning in mesa arizona. we went to the end of gilbert road and the salt river. the river was flooding due to spring snow melt and rain. as me and two other friends watched the flood along with a dozen or so others in the area not known to us, i noticed a hang glider coming in very low from the south behind us. i asked don and dave where could a hang glider take off from around here. they did not pay attention to me the first time i asked. the craft was moving very slowly 5miles per hour tops. as it got within 150yards i could see it was not a hang glider at all , it was a dull matalic wedge shaped craft about 6 to 8 ft long 3 ft wide 2ft tall. it was silent. it had rods coming out from the front four corners at 45deg from the hull the same from the rear four corners. the rods were facing forward in the front and backward in the rear. i grabed my friend by the arm and said that is no hang glider. they then turned to watch as the craft went over and to the east. we all watched speachless as the craft slowly rose as it went to the north east over red mountain .I watched untill it was just a dot. it never made a sound or changed speed.No lights no windows, no sound. we went back to dons apt and all made a picture of what we saw. they were the same, don and dave were very sceptical yet they new what we saw. over the years iam the only one who likes to talk about it. they seem bothered by the encounter.It was the most incrdible thing i ever saw. i have been in aerospace for 21 years and still would like to see another one.
content.summary: We were watching the salt river during a spring time flood and i saw a hang glider coming from the south, as it closed to within 150 yards it was clere it was a wedge shaped craft 6 to 8 foot long with rods on the front  and rear corners.

content.detailedDescription: In nov.1990 i was walking down highway 550 in dwarf kentucky.I heard a wird sound (like a motor like sound).I turned to see if a car or truck was coming,but seen nothing.The sound got louder.I thought that it sounded like it was flying.I looked up behind me.Over my left side.I watched a red obejct move over the hill flying low over the tree tops.For the trees was bare i seen it clear.It had looked like the shape of a fish bowl,with a dome top.It was well lite.The bottom was like a up-side down bowl with lights as well.I watched this till it moved over the hill top in front of me,and was gone.I found photos on line that looks like what i seen.
content.summary: Seen a red solid object over a hill top.

content.detailedDescription: It was up in the sky and came towards me and the the lights turned off and went backwards,and to the left, went across the marshlands and over south san francisco bay,it loward towards the water and hovard. no sound at all. ten minuets later i seen the same object with lights flashing again, and took off north east across the bay.    1.At the sunnyvale smart station(city dump) i was getting ready to work on my loader to load trucks. 2.I looked up in the sky and saw lights.3.Something i never seen before.4.It came toward me and went back and to the left and across the bay.5. i was with co workers and we we were all in awe and in semi shocked,like what the f..K was that?6.It went across the bay and dissapeared. i have photos but only on my verizon cell phone with documented time, if you have a picture phone i can send to you.
content.summary: Circular with red and white lights rotating

content.detailedDescription: I had taken my dog out around 8:00pm and while he was in the back yard i had looked up and noticed the big dipper. i was facing south/ east and saw what i thought at first was a star,because that was the shape and color, but it was moving in an easterly direction and like a wobbly line. not side to side, but wobbly and going pretty quick. now just prior to and after, i did see planes in the sky, with there different colored blinking lights. that is why i knew this was not an airplane or a helicopter. there was no noise. it moved toward the east until i could no longer see it. like i stated, when i first saw this i said " no friggin way" " that's no star" i felt excited a little because like i said earlier, i saw planes in the sky then this object, and this was no plane.
content.summary: Walking dog in backyard looked up and saw an object moving wobbly

content.detailedDescription:
I was just getting ready to head to a friends house warming party when i looked off towards my house.  i couldn't see my house, but i looked in the direction as i was looking down towards the river that goes through my town.  as i was looking, i noticed an extremely bright, flashing light.  it was flashing white, red, and orange.  i enjoy looking at stars, and i know that this was nothing of the sort.  i knew what direction i was facing, but just to make sure it wasn't venus i looked towards where venus is normally and there it was, bright and white.  i continued to stare at the object as i was driving, and then i looked back at the road when my cell phone rang and about two minutes into the conversation, i looked back and the light was totally gone.  i have seen this light before in different areas of the sky as well, but mostly in the area that i was looking this night.  i can see it from just about anywhere i go, too, and it doesn't go down the horizon at all when i move over the curve of the earth.

later on in the evening once i reached my friends house, i got out of my car and went up to his car and started to talk to him.  when i looked off to the horizon down the street, i saw a bright, completely red light.  i was not familiar with the area that this house was in so i figured it was the light on top of a water tower or something similar.  i started talking to my friend again, and for one reason or another, i looked up and just as i did, i saw the red light take off in an extremely fast pace, disappearing behind a house on the horizon.  i know that it was not a plane because it literally sat on the horizon for ten minutes while i talked to my friend, all of a sudden to just immediately take off north.  i told my friend about it was it was moving, and i never looked away.  by the time he got out of his car and looked, it was gone.  he got out of his car immediately, so it shows just how little time he had to actually see the object.
content.summary: Flashing, extremely bright, light

content.detailedDescription:
1. outside looking at the stars and smoking a cigarette.

2. when i was looking at the stars it just appeared out of no where.

3. thoght it was a flock of birds.

4. there were about six white objects parallel to each other. they were moving at a great rate of speed. they kind of glistened, thought it was the light from the city. but noticed no flapping of any wings. travelling north from the south. it kinded glided in its direction and dissapered into the night sky.

5. wow, not sure what i just saw.

6. through the tree line.
content.summary: V shaped parallel to each other

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the kitchen getting ready to feed my bunny when all of a sudden i got hot from the inside out and had to run outside because of the heat..It was pretty dark outside and around 9pm...I looked toward the north and saw two huge white lights in the sky(fairly low) through the pine trees that were coming right towards our apartment...There was no noise the whole time this was happening...I called for my 25 year old daughter to come out and look and i asked her to run and get the binoculars...After she gave it to me, it hovered for almost a minute or two above us.
it swayed from side to side and at one point stood up and looked tall but then went back to it's triangular shape...We could see pulsating white and red lights...And it was huge! we agreed on what we both saw...It was definitely a ufo. after we looked through the binoculars and saw details of the ship it was obviously not of our world! it was a dark gray color with odd looking squiggly like markings on it. my daughter got scared when she saw it up close with the binoculars and was trying to pull me back inside...I was pretty shook up too..I ran back out to see if it was still there and it was heading south of town. i watched it until it disappeared.
content.summary: My daughter and i saw a triangular craft over our home with pulsating white and red lights

content.detailedDescription: In traful lake, in neuquen, argentina, 2 discs were at 45��� over the ground.
content.summary: I did't see until i see the pic in the computer.

content.detailedDescription:
At very close to 8pm est i observed a "greenish-white" illuminated ball descending from my location (40 28'48.63"n 79 34'39.33"w) nnw direction.

duration of event was about 15 seconds - it may have been visible longer but i was looking at a different direction (towards venus?) then looked nnw and saw illuminated light descending.  rate was not rapid (but too fast to be a flare, and no report from firework heard) - i saw it descend about 15 degrees at least in terms of the arc of the sky - almost straight down. no trail visible behind fireball - there was still a little light on the western horizon, maybe that obscured a trail.  ball had a "halo" around it - very light clouds visible in that direction.  was several times brighter than venus.
content.summary: Fireball descending

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were at my parents house on lake fenton and decided that we would get a blanket and some coffee and watch the stars, partially to be romantic and we like to watch satelites, meteors,etc etc. we probably went down by the sea wall/beach area about 11:00 pm. we seen maybee 5 or 6 shooting stars or debris burn up as they came through the atmosphere. anyways, about 3 in the morning as i lay looking up, scanning the sky for anything, i arched my head back and looked over my right shoulder as my feet were pointed west, looking to the north, i looked over and i seen somthing behind me,which was east. i seen seven crafts flying very fast. as they came directly over me, i counted them,thats why i said seven, not several.Anyways the wierd thing is, that as i watched them fly, the ones in the front on the formation would take turns going to the back and middle of the formation as they all kept flying forward. real fast changes in the formation. i would guess they were flying at about 20 thousand feet. they didnt make any sounds at all and they all radiated fuzzy green glows.From the horizon behind me, where they first caught my eye, till they were out in front of me was about 3 or 4 seconds. a jet at 30 thousand feet is traveling well over 500 mph and as you know,they still seem to be almost standing still. what i seen was moving way to fast for our planets technology. they must of covered atleast 30-40 miles in 4 seconds or so. like mach 20 30 40 or somthing crazy like that. then they stopped all at the same time and just hovered together for 5 seconds and all at the same time, went up, fast, real fast. from the time they hovered together until they shot straight up and out of our atmosphere was probably 2 seconds and they were gone. thats basically it. call if you want more detail. thanks, brian
content.summary: Seven crafts doing amazing things.

content.detailedDescription: Was out walking the dog when noticed at about nine o'clock in the western sky a brilliant white light.  the light appeared to be hovering and steady in brilliance.  it then became brighter and moved southerly at a rapid speed approximately five miles.  the light itself seemed to be about fifteen miles away from my house.  it's brilliance made it easy to follow through the trees.  it again hovered steadfast over one location for five minutes before the brightness began to fade and then change to blue making it difficult to see in the night sky.  after about one minute it then regained its bright white color and remained in the same location and moved in a northerly direction a slight distance, i did not have to move much to regain sight through the trees.  i then put the dog in the house and yelled for my wife to come out and look at the light.  it remained bright white in color and was easy to find again and point out to my wife.  it had move only a slight distance from when i let the dog in.  my wife noticed its color and brilliance changes and asked what it was.  i didn't have a clue and said so.  my wife then went back into the house.  i continued to watch the light do its slow color changes and movements normally south a few miles for about five minutes.  i then noticed the light began to pulse between bright white and deep blue and back in closer intervals.  i began to notice numerous jets flying towards the light from the east, north, and south.  these craft were easy to determine because of their flashing lights and engine noise.  the white light then began to move while pulsating between colors in a zig-zag motion northeast to southeast.  it almost appeared to be a fiber-optics strand with only the end visible being swung through the air.  i wondered why would intelligent beings do stupid things like that. the light then dimmed to a low brilliance white and dropped below the tree light so i could not follow it any  more.  i waited and watched for another five minutes before coming in the house.
content.summary: Bright white light dimming to blue doing rapid lateral movement then hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday, march 10, 2007
www.We-are-not-alone.Us click on ���for marines only��� to see what the dod refuses to contract!

ufo contacts: please copy/fax/email/meet/discuss the following with anyone ��� everyone!
ufo portal open to the universe: since time started and since humans started walking, aliens have been visiting our planet, to pack up something important to them, in more recent time, one alien civilization has have been using mostly women. another group is more concerned with our nuclear capability, our attempts to put nuclear capabilities into the universe and the fact humans can���t stop killing each other, by the millions. i have been showing (1969 to present) thousands this portal and 99% of them can see what is taking place today. in september 2005, the portal was shut down/closed by an alien security force. there have been three extremely powerful alien security ships controlling who leaves and who arrives. many watched in august 2006, has an alien ship attempted to enter the portal to leave, one of the reddish glowing alien security ships intercepted it then blew it too bits. has the ship, what was left of it, reentered our atmosphere, it looked like a space object was falling with hundreds of bright white materials flying into the north pacific ocean, northwest of seattle. many persons called into the nw news reporters and stated what they thought they saw, but i received emails and phone calls: ���ted, did you see what just happened? you were right, you have informed all of us, that the planetary ships stuck here on earth have to leave, they can���t stay here forever, you were right.���

i worked for a telecommunications corporation, responsible for our us government and military communications, thanks to this job and because the corporation system had serious problems, i was sent to location i would never have been able to visit, let alone work on top secret sites/locations/systems. seven times, i was sent to nellis afb too resolve issues that no other department/personnel could, several times this included area 51 and the 2nd valley (underground nuclear engineering/scientists /physicists) what i saw where alien grays that look just like 6��� 2��� strong humans with several exceptions: ���they are grey/no hair and only wear special grey clothing, of course it���s a possibility they do wear something else but completely grey jumpers. humans can not work in the 2nd valley where nuclear underground testing takes place.  i would love to tell all what i have seen���..Maybe in person and after several alaskan amber beers. enjoy, hundreds of thousands are watching including the dod/norad/nasa.

something is happening ��� extremely important ��� do our governments know about this? yes  

i���ve been watching a special location in the heavens for 30 years, (ufo universe freeway entrance/portal) and have seen several hundred mother ships and planetary vehicles come and go. since august, something has changed.

three (3) small red alien ships are controlling the entrance. i've not seen one alien mother ship come or go since this started. they move fast, they chase one another, they hold in place; this has been going for several weeks now. you don't require anything more than your own eyes. but you have to be in a dark location, you will not be able to see them if your in a city. if you can see the big dipper, look to the south around arcturus and watch between 9 pm and midnight. they are too dark and move to fast to record with any normal camera.

i think they���re here for a reason. are they protecting our planet for some reason? 
if so - what? - why?

they have to be security ships - very powerful and are controlling what alien civilizations visit our galaxy - what other reason could there be?

i hope you can see the big dipper from your home. good luck, enjoy, this is exciting, but scary at the same time!

arcturus[arktoor���us] pronunciation key, brightest star in the constellation bootes and 4th-brightest star in the entire sky; bayer designation alpha bootis; 1992 position r.A. 14h15.3m, dec. +19���13���. an orange giant of spectral class k2 iii, it has an apparent magnitude of -0.06; its diameter is about 10 times that of the sun and its luminosity about 100 times that of the sun. arcturus is one of the nearest giant stars, at a distance of about 36 light-years, and has one of the largest proper motions (annual angular shift in position) of the bright stars. its name is from the greek meaning "guardian of the bear," and it can be found by following the extension of the curve of the handle of the big dipper (large bear).

content.detailedDescription: In someone is interested in a more detailed report they may contact me via email.  i have had numerous sightings in my area since september 26,2006.  the objects i saw this evening were ones i have seen before.  i find it time consuming to go into extreme detail at this time but if i can in anyway help you with my report by all means let me know.
content.summary: Two white objects traversed sky north to south at high rate of speed,visibly vibrating remained parallel t o each other.  visible for 10-15 seconds disappearing in sky, seeming just to fade out.

content.detailedDescription:
20 years ago, my aunt was driving myself, my sister, and cousin to get ice cream. my cousin and i were in the back seat of the car goofing around (this is going to sound stupid) imitating the opening scene to "leave it to beaver" when he's in the back seat of the car and then turns around and looks out the back window.  well, we did that and when we looked out the window and looked up we saw the ufo in the tree line.  we screamed (we were 13 at the time) and my aunt stopped the car and pulled over.  we all got out of the car and stared up at the triangle shaped object that hovered above us.  there was no noise.  the object had red, green, and clear lights outlighting it.  we stood there for no more than 2 minutes and the object then shot vertically up extremely fast and then moved horizontally in the sky at an extremely fast speed. it was out of our sight very quickly.  we stood there in awe and i remember my aunt saying "that was no airplane".  we all knew it was nothing we had ever seen before.  i remember not being scared, just more amazed.  if i was by myself i may have been scared.  

we contemplated calling the police, but did not after realizing that there would be nothing they could do.  

if i remember correctly, there was a story in the local newspaer "the new jersey herald" about strange lights seen over sussex county.

i think about that night often, and even 20 years later, my sister, cousin, and i remember that night clearly.  it's definitley something i will never forget.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo appeared over tree line.  triangle shaped, red, green, and clear lights.

content.detailedDescription: After i had my child i came down with the flu i called my mom to come and get my child when she took her so i can rest, i laid down on my couch closed my eyes for a minute opened them and this being was standing over me , the surroundings were unfamiliar i was not inmy home  all i could see was white light and white walls .This being was slender almost annorexic.Dark slanted oval eyes a very slender nose and a slender mouth .This being didn't talk verbally,it spoke with some sort of telepathy .It told me to go to sleep were not going to hurt you.After awhile i woke back up feeling well like i had no sickness at all.I think this being not only healed me i contain some sort of info i can't explain on paper  i think it's some un charted star charts.Please e-mail me back
content.summary: Very close/this being was in my home

content.detailedDescription:
On thursday, march 8, 2007 at 10:36am i was in glendale, california at the corner of louise and broadway in a parking lot waiting for my friend. i looked up at the sky as there were many chem-trails which i love to try and figure what aircraft made them, at one point as i was looking up, i saw a black triangle shaped craft doing maneuvers like an old bi-plane except it was up so high it could not have been a bi-plane. the maneuvers the craft was doing was just unbelievable.  all of a sudden, a second craft (same shape) went next to the other object and started doing the same types of maneuvers, again the maneuvers were awesome and so unbelievable, there is no way conventional aircraft were involved. the first object that i had witnessed took off to the south east at an incredible rate of speed. then the second object followed the other one again at a very high rate of speed. i do not know what i saw, but i can say, that there is no way these were conventional aircraft, if they were from the military, they must be very highly classified aircraft. i leave it up to you to decide what these objects are, i truly can���t say what they were. any questions, just send me a message.

thank you for taking time to read my experience.


i have no pictures or video, this is just what i saw.
content.summary: I saw two objects doing maneuvers that were unbelievable not regular aircraft

content.detailedDescription: The object hovered for about 30 min. no sound was heard so it couldn't have been a helicopter and it was close enough to be heard if it was one. it was positioned on the northwestern sky about 1-2 miles high.  i spotted this object because it was about 4 times bigger than the biggest star and it emitted a glow due to the moisture present at the time. there were a few clouds present that evening. i was intrigued by the sight and i was able to obeserve it for about a half-hour before i had to resume with my activities.  besides, it was a bit cold.  the object did not move at all the entire time of the sighting.
content.summary: Bright, white, larger than a star, had a steady glow.

content.detailedDescription: At around 11:30 pm march 9 2007 we were in an apartment in kansas city mo, city market area, third floor with windows facing the west.  we were (4 people) were in the living room when a fast moving bright light went overhead.  my friend was standing at the open window when it went over and heard no noise.  we watched thru the window as it moved northwest at rapid pace.  there was at least 3 white lights in what seemed to be in a triangluar pattern. it went to the area of the kansas city downtown airport, seemed to hover, the white lights went off, but red lights came on in the same pattern, then it seemed to disappear for maybe 5 seconds.  it reappeared over the area of the airport, still hovering, went north slightly, went south slightly, hovered over the same area, the white lights came back on, and then it quickly moved south.  we watched until it went behind the downtown skyline, and we lost it.  there was no noise, no sound.  i called 911 and the operator asked my location, i described what i saw, and i asked if there were any helicopers flying in the area.  she said no, and that my call wasn't the first one she had gotten about the incident.  after the call, 5 minutes later, i went outside on the fire escape\balcony and noticed 2 helicopters going towards the airport with spotlighs on.  we called the local fox newsline and told them what happened.  it moved too fast for a helicopter and too quiet for a plane and it moved fast.  please contact us, we are excited about what we saw!  it was amazing!
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright fast moving lights no sound erratic behavior

content.detailedDescription:
While picking up my son from the montessori schoolhouse near the intersection of 6th ave. and speedway blvd. at five minutes after noon i looked up at the chemtrails and noticed a white dot next to one.  it remained stationary so i pointed it out to my mom and to some adults (teachers and two parents) on the schoolyard.  we observed it for about ten minutes from the schoolyard and parking lot combined.  it seemed to move, but the movement was perhaps the chemtrail moving.  when the ufo was in the chemtrail it was hard to see.  it did not seem to give off light but rather to be a white sphere or metalic sphere.  it was observed northwest of the santa catalina mountains, high in the sky. i called george parks on my cell phone and reported it to him.  he is the state section director of mufon here.  i lost sight of the object because i decided to get in my car and leave after some time.  i took a photo of it with a disposable camera.  i don't suppose it will be visible in the photo because the camera did not have a telephoto lens. 

i was very excited to see it as it looked like the orbs often seen floating in flotillas in mexico.  there was only one, however. i was with my mother, who is visiting from alabama.  that also made it more exciting.  one of the witnesses, a parent, had had a previous sighting and is a coast to coast fan.  he may go to the mufon meeting tomorrow because i told him about our meetings after he asked me about my being a "ufo expert."

i am a mufon member and abductee.  this was my second sighting in arizona since i moved here last year.  the other one was an orange orb trailing a plane at night.  i have had two other daylight sightings in los angeles and two night time sightings in the california deserts.
content.summary: While picking up my son from school i looked up at the chemtrails and noticed a white dot next to a chemtrail.  i observed it with at least three witnesses for around ten minutes.

content.detailedDescription: My parents and i were out on our deck smoking,talking and looking at the stars. it was a beautiful, clear night! the stars were at their peak, as if you could reach right up and touch each and every one of them! we were talking about the sky and different star clusters when all at once something strange was appearing to come right at us. as this thing got closer to us, i asked my parents,"what the hell is that?!" my mother just looked at the thing as if she couldnot believe her eyes. my father said,"i be damned if i know! we just watched as it hoovered over the house behind us, which is appro. 75-80 ft away from us. the lights on it were flashing in sequences like christmas tree lights. we just stared. i told my moma and dad, i had to go in and get my husband so he could see this and that he would never believe it if i didn't but at that moment it was as if i couldn't take my eyes off the lights! it was like something out of tv or a dream! finally, i ran in the back door, and yelled for him to come out now! i turned around and ran back out. just as i got out it shot right straight up and disappeared! i said "where did it go?" and my mom said up somewhere?! she said, "i'm 69 years old and i have never, never seen anything like this in my life and probably never will again. i think if there is such things as ufos, we just saw one!" my dad said, "well, i think we just saw exactly that, a ufo!" i personly was still shaking from seeing this thing. when my husband came out and we told him what happened, he just looked at us as if we were crazy and so does people that i tell about it. but it happened and i'm glad i got to witness this with my parents because my mom died in april of 1998 and my father died in june of 1999. until they died, we spoke often of what we witnessed that beautiful night and wonder what and where it came from. even a week before my father passed away, he and i were telling a friend of his about it. he was in the hospital at that time and later this man asked me if it were true. i told him, "i promise you on my son's life it is true! this is my story, honestly."
content.summary: Appeared to be round with lights flashing in sequencesmy

content.detailedDescription: Center of hutchinson on the community college campus 7:10 pm on a clear night. craft came from east northeast moving west southwest toward wichita. craft was a ball of creamy yellow light fifteen feet in diameter two thousand feet in altitude. no sound. slow movement with pauses in speed yet kept moving steadily with slight side movements. odd: a fixed-wing plane coming from the southeast intersected its flight path. one quarter mile before they met, the light on the craft dimmed slowly. the craft then flew steadily under the airplane as it disappeared into the night sky.
content.summary: Craft over hutchinson moving toward wichita, kansas

content.detailedDescription:
This is a long story. it started in oct 2005 when i witnessed ufo activity for 3 straight nights. jets were in formations over strange objects in the sky. on the third night i witnessed a gigantic triangular shaped object totally silent, very slow moving.   
every since then i have had encounters with smaller objects, following me i believe. anyway on march 5, 2007 at about 1955 in the evening i left my apartment to go to my mothers home. i immediatly noticed the all familiar orbs of light that appear every so often. there were two of them, about 1000-1500 ft off the ground, hovering and changing colors. i began to film one of them with my camera phone. when observing the object on the camera screen it shows a large orb with smaller lights rotating around it. i will be sending this video. another great video of some of the cases that happened in virginia in 2005 can be seen at pilotonline.Com.
content.summary: Another ufo sighting in suffolk, va this time on tape.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 8, 2007, at approximately 13:11 pm (easter standard time), i was returning home from lunch and noticed several jets creating contrail in the sky. it was at this point that i noticed a spherical object hovering and bobbing in the n/e sky. the object was shining brightly in the blue sky, but i noticed its wobbling i would often see a dark undercarriage. additionally, the sphere was moving very slowly and then looked to be stationary.  

	at this point, i pulled my vehicle into the first baptist church parking lot and observed the sphere. the parking lot is on the corner of ridge and walnut, i was going east on ridge. additionally, the object was positioned in the n/e sky. i though the sphere might have been a balloon let go, but it seemed somewhat larger and brighter than what one might expect and something did not seem right about how it wobbled. i exited my vehicle and observed the object for approximately another 3-4 minutes. the sphere appeared to be hovering while i looked n/e.  i continued to walk towards the sphere hoping to get a better look.  

	unfortunately, i was not able to find anyone who could also observer this sphere in my general area. at approximately 13:14 pm (eastern standard time), i noted something shoot off of the sphere. this object seemed to by cylindrical in shape and was wobbling itself, but moved slightly quicker than the original sphere. within a few seconds, i lost sight of this object (faded out of sight?). at approximately 13:16 pm (eastern standard time), i lost sight of the sphere. i scanned the sky for a few more minutes, but the object was no longer visible. at this point, i returned to my vehicle.

	at this point, i am unsure of what i witnessed. it was probably terrestrial, but it certainly caught my attention. in fact, it reminded me of the videos of the mexican ufo���s and the grainy footage of military test objects viewed in florida. if you have any questions feel free to contact me via phone or mailing, but i would prefer to remain anonymous at this juncture.I was surprised to see the object, but was more curious than frightened. i am sure there is some logical explanation for this event.



thank you,
s. harris
content.summary: Strange wobbling sphere and cylinder during encounter

content.detailedDescription: I was in my moms car with my mom and sister. we had just finished getting our chrismas tree and headed to walmart to get some ortaments.Something shiny caught my eye and i looked up and saw a shiny boomerang thing and it was just hovering over head, about 900 to 1000 feet.
content.summary: I could see the bottom it was boomerang like, it had a small curve at the base of it and two little shiny  things
